comment._content: well its still theri although the prices have risen a little

comment.author: 80038558@N00
comment._content: and if I remember rightly, this pub has been there for nearly as long as Brazil has been Brazil! I love this place. It was one of the first pubs I visited when I moved to London 10 years ago.

comment.author: 23829501@N00
comment._content: one of the sixties excursions it had saw-dust on the floor

comment.author: 44743114@N06
comment._content: In 2001 I sat in the The Prospect, as I lived around the corner, and I saw a Bottle nosed dolphin in the river Thames. It was amazing diving and swimming. It got in the news and they followed it but it died two weeks later.
